alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and Franklin Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Marks to 11 miles north of Eastpoint. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Shadeville, Royal Bluff, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Fort Gadsden, Morgan Place, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre, High Bluff and Yent Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
